short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Read a daily Quranic verse for inspiration.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Start your day with recitation of The Holy Quran. This simple Chrome extension provides a great opportunity to read The Quran regularly and complete the whole book at your own pace conveniently.

Description:
* Read verses of The Quran right from your Chrome browser's toolbar.
* Pick up the verse where you left off ensuring the continuation.
* Audio playback and pause for ease of reading and listening.
* Bookmark verses to read in the future.
* Background playback feature so you can carry on with your work and daily tasks while listening to The Holy Quran in the background.
* Share a verse with your friends and family.
* Easy search feature to read a specific Surah.

This Chrome extension is a fantastic way to bring Quran recitation in your daily life. Install now and embark on a journey of spiritual enrichment and enlightenment.
